overview:
Charles Parra, Senior Vice President of Product Development at TreSensa. Charles joined TreSensa as its SVP of Product Development in April 2012 and is responsible for leading the companyâ€™s overall product roadmap.

He brings more than 20 years of technology experience to TreSensa. Charles joined the company from appssavvy where he served, most recently, as Vice President of Product Development.

Previously Charles held the role of vice president of Product Management at Tremor Video and spent more than four years driving Tremor Videoâ€™s market-leading and differentiated online video advertising monetization platform and network, and was instrumental in creating the vision and architecture for Tremor Videoâ€™s patent-pending publisher-facing Acudeo technology.

Prior to Tremor Video, he was senior director of product management at The FeedRoom, an Internet video communications company. Charles also ran his own consulting firm, Parra Development and was vice president information technology for Guggenheim.com, an online destination for the arts. Also, Charles was the chief technology officer at Interep National Radio Sales and led the development of RadioExchange.com, an online media exchange to facilitate the purchasing of national radio advertising.

milestones.description: Joined Appssavvy as VP of Product
